Ask: For this challenge question, we are going to match statements to their correct decimals. Please could you say out loud the decimal that matches the first statement a.
Visual Aid: A sentence saying that the number has 2 in the hundredths place with the options of 1.68 and 5.32 and 6.2 and 61.4

Ask: Now which decimals match the statement in b.
Visual Aid: A sentence saying that the number has 2 in the hundredths place with the options of 1.68 and 5.32 and 6.2 and 61.4
A sentence saying that the number has 2 in the hundredths place with the options of 1.68 and 5.32 and 6.2 and 61.4

Correct Answers.comment: a common misconception is that the student can say 6.2 which has 6 tens
